name: TC_55!604 (Lang: de) | Bid:55!604-de.de.NoAuth
description:
Check: Menu section [Learn] > Menu item [Market guides] > Click on the “Oil trading guide” link >
                Сlick the [Try demo]/[Start oil trading] button > Close the “Sign up” form
        Language: All
        License: All, except SCB (UA country)
        Author: Kasila
descriptionHtml:
Check: Menu section [Learn] > Menu item [Market guides] > Click on the “Oil trading guide” link >
            Сlick the [Try demo]/[Start oil trading] button > Close the “Sign up” form
    Language: All
    License: All, except SCB (UA country)
    Author: Kasila

testStage.description:
Check: Menu section [Learn] > Menu item [Market guides] > Click on the “Oil trading guide” link >
                Сlick the [Try demo]/[Start oil trading] button > Close the “Sign up” form
        Language: All
        License: All, except SCB (UA country)
        Author: Kasila

steps.name: Start retest manual AT_55!604 Loading spinner appears and spins endlessly in the center of the page
Build dynamic argument for TCs of US_55

parameters.name: desc_tc
parameters.value: 'Loading spinner appears and spins endlessly in the center of the page after clicking the button [Start oil trading] / [Try demo] and closing the “Sign up” form on the page “What is oil trading” when any language is selected (SCA, ASIC, CYSEC, FCA licenses)'

labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!604 | Loading spinner appears and spins endlessly in the center of the page after clicking the button [Start oil trading] / [Try demo] and closing the “Sign up” form on the page “What is oil trading” when any language is selected (SCA, ASIC, CYSEC, FCA licenses)
